PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1994-08901994-05-260,  ,  ,  ,  JUS
PrecisAuthorization to the Honourable Sidney N. Lederman, a Judge of the Ontario Court of Justice (General Division), to act as a member of the Human Rights Tribunal Panel to hold office for such time as to allow him to conclude his mandate as Chairman in the matter of William Clarke v. Canadian Armed Forces to which he was appointed on October 27, 1993 by the President of the Human Rights Tribunal Panel pursuant to section 49(1.1) of the Canadian Human Rights Act.
Attachments
